title: Revisiting the unified principle for the single-atom electrocatalysts in sulfur reduction reaction: from liquid to solid-state electrolytes
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01885K, Paper
Jiadong Shen, Ziwei Liang, Tengteng Gu, Zhaoyu Sun, Yi Wen Wu, Xiaoqing Liu, Junhao Liu, Xiuying Zhang, Jiangwen Liu, Lei Shen, Min Zhu, Jun Liu
The conversion of lithium-polysulfides (LPSs) through the sulfur reduction reaction (SRR) is a crucial process for improving the electrochemical performance of lithium-sulfur (Li-S) batteries. However, the microscopic mechanism of SRR...
